name: tdt4215
body:
## Norsk legemiddelhåndbok search system.
This is a search system that uses patient notes as search query for therapy chapters of the Norwegian handbook for pharmaceutical interventions (Legemiddelhåndboka).

### Requirements
It require [Python](http://python.org) 3.2 and [Whoosh](http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Whoosh) 2.3.2 (or later versions).

### Background
This project is our solution to the mandatory assignment in the course
[TDT4215 Web-intelligence](http://www.idi.ntnu.no/emner/tdt4215/) at [Norwegian University of Science and Technology (NTNU)](http://www.ntnu.no/) spring 2012. Assignment text and our deliverables can be found on the projects [download page](http://github.com/eventh/tdt4215/downloads).

### Creators
We are @eventh, @snarby and @weilin (group 1).

### System architecture
![System architecture](http://github.com/eventh/tdt4215/raw/master/report/img/system_architecture2.png)
